name: The "Original" Black Loop Circle Scarf (Priority Shipping 2-3 days)
description:
There is an endless amount of clever and spontaneous ways to wear this great circle scarf!  Let your imagination run wild, never just settle on one style.  Don’t be afraid to play around and drape it, tie it, tuck it or just LOOP it!  How will you wear yours?

Single, double, triple loop it, hood it, wear it as a vest, stylish top, skirt, shawl, or sarong for beach use!  Never worry again how to tie your scarf and making it look good.

This is a over sized stretchable circle scarf of approximately 30" wide, by 60" long (around), which allows you to wear it in so many ways.  Super soft, made of 100% Viscose.

$2 goes toward our charity for donation, Heifer International.

We guarantee 100% satisfaction.  If you are not happy with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges or returns.

name: The Loop Circle Scarf Neck Warmer
description:
The Loop Neck Warmers are an easy way to dress up any outfit or outerwear. The Loop Neck Warmers are short and sweet fashion accessories that come in a variety of colors. Great gifts, great accessories for men and women that will add a unique and stylish touch to your look.  These knit circle scarves are a great addition to any wardrobe for the cold weather! 

Dimensions: 12"24" (inches) or 30 x 61 (cm) (stretchable)
Size: One Size Fits All
Material: 100% Acrylic - very soft and soothing!

We guarantee 100% satisfaction.  If you are not happy with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges or returns.

name: The Fringe Loop
description:
Make a subtle statement with the FRINGE LOOP scarf. This circle scarf is the newest fashion accessory to make a modern, spontaneous statement. Designed with a hint of the 60s, it comes with 9” fringe and is a great accessory to wear as you make your way about town.

**$2 of your purchase goes to our charity, www.heifer.org!** 

50% Polyester/50% Cotton
Dimensions:   37.5”x20”; Circumference 75”

We guarantee 100% satisfaction.  If you are not happy with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges or returns.
